idea-plugin.name: Burnt Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Burnt Theme for JetBrains IDEs. A dark theme with the right visual clues to assist you in your long coding journeys.

The accompanying color scheme features a rich, vibrant palette carefully tuned to help you stay focused and productive.

Why the Burnt theme? Simple, because other dark themes are not dark enough for my taste. This is a really dark theme, crafted with great attention to the details. Hope you enjoy it as much as I do!





Contribute with GitHub: https://github.com/proteo/burnt
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• v1.2 Reworked DIFF, VCS and debugger colors. Slightly brighter hue for selection background.
  • v1.1 A few more UI elements are colorized. Active tab underline color is more visible. Several other subtle adjustments.
